name: indefensible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
too bad to be protected from criticism: morally indefensible The war is morally indefensible. His opinions/attitudes are completely indefensible.
not able to be protected against attack: indefensible borders

indefensibly

(of behavior) so bad that it cannot be defended against criticism: His actions in destroying the tapes were indefensible.
